channel.title: Change weapon speed [PI]
channel.description: So i was just wondering how you would change a weapon's attack speed on a PI server? I wanted to have a weak weapon with a fast attack speed for beginners to train with, but can't find the code for the speed.

item.title: Change weapon speed [PI]
item.dc:creator: @talontantalize talontantalize
item.description:
@talontantalize wrote:

[quote=“blo0d pker, post:2, topic:420917”]CombatAssistant.
search for:

/** * Weapon and magic attack speed! **/
or

It’s pretty simple from there…

if(c.playerEquipment[c.playerWeapon] == -1) return 4;//unarmed
is regular speeds. I think you can handle it from here. ;)[/quote]
Ah yes, I got it now, thank you very much sir

Read full topic

search for:
